LevelComment:
Choose a pattern that is different from all other patterns.
If you make a mistake or fail to choose a pattern within the allotted time (<color=#FFFFFF>{0}</color>), the game is over.
BonusSComment: Win bonus time by revealing any <color=#FFFFFF>{0}</color> cards.
BonusPComment: Win bonus time by revealing pairs of cards with the same numbers in <color=#FFFFFF>{0}</color> attempts.
ErrorStorage: Error! Saving progress is not available!
WarningAuthorization: Cloud save, personalization and leaderboard are not available without authorization
